name: Who Crossed
description:
INFO: ►Under Development 

The game is currently in development.

The current version is a beta, more levels soon.
  1.  game size: 42,000 KB.  
  2. Full game duration: Expected game play duration: ± 3 hrs.
  3.  multiple runs (this may vary from user).
  4. Developed in unity.
  5. This game is being developed by only one person.
  6. Compatible with controller - movement and camera only.
Contact:

I am open to changes and improvements that you consider might improve the final game experience, leave your suggestions in the comments - Thanks to everybody who supports me!

Controls:

WADS : Movement

Mouse : Camera movement.

LEFT CLICK: Control character, click on character to move..

RIGHT CLICK: Switch camera's.

M: Go back to main menu.

R: Restart level.

Thank through different levels.
